column1: sin is a Quenya word either meaning "thus" (adverb) or "this" (as an independent word in the sentence
column2: not modifying another word like sina does).  Attested in the sentence sin quentë Quendingoldo Elendilenna
column3: either "this Pengolodh said to Elendil" or "thus spoke Pengolodh to Elendil".  Also a form of sí "now" occurring before vowels
